### {{< fa circle-user >}} Bio 

::: {.grid}
::: {.g-col-6}

Margot is a graduate of the Australian National University (ANU) with a Bachelor of Science (Honours) on bushfire chemical ecology. She works to improve data quality in the ALA. Margot is a strong advocate for diversity and inclusion in the STEMM fields.
